content: off -­ using a tapestry needle with an extremely long tail of yarn pull the needle through two front loops as if to purl then back through the first stitch as if to knit drop the first stitch off repeat to the end bacoknitter designs page 2 all pattern elements both written and graphic © sarah parr 2011 pattern is for not-­ for-­ profit use only and may not be reproduced redistributed or sold pattern or finished object without express permission of the author all rights reserved finishing weave in ends with a yarn needle and enjoy you can add fun images onto these like i did using these free star wars charts from http //www knitting-­ and com/knitting/patterns/charts/starwars htm abbreviations co cast on dpn s double pointed needle s k knit st s stitch es k2tog knit 2 together cc contrasting color kfbl knit front and back loop mc main color ktbl knit through back loop rs right side ssk slip slip knit ws wrong side p purl pm place marker p2tog purl 2 together sm slip marker yo yarn over bobble bind off bacoknitter designs page 3 all pattern elements both written and graphic © sarah parr 2011 pattern is for not-­ for-­ profit use only and may not be reproduced redistributed or sold pattern or finished object without express permission of the author all rights reserved
